title: ICE RAIDS DAY 55 - Minneapolis/St Paul, MN
description:
Operation Metro Surge is the large federal immigration enforcement effort in Minnesota that began in December 2025 and continues into 2026, with agents from ICE and Border Patrol arresting thousands of people across the Twin Cities and beyond as part of what the Department of Homeland Security called the largest operation of its kind in the state. The crackdown has been deeply controversial, and there have been multiple killings tied to it. On January 7, a U.S. citizen named Renée Good was fatally shot by an ICE agent during an enforcement action. On January 24, another U.S. citizen, 37-year-old ICU nurse Alex Pretti, was shot and killed by a Border Patrol agent during a protest and enforcement encounter in Minneapolis. Both deaths have sparked widespread protests, political outcry, and calls for investigations into the use of force
